description.en:
Cerealia is already a blockchain powered agri-trading platform and fintech company. Acting with two marketplaces, one already in operation, with millions of tons of products posted monthly, and another in the final stage of development for NFTs trading of agri-commodities. Cerealia, in March 2021, issued the world’s first NFT for agri- commodities and commodities in general.
Other services Cerealia provides are: documents’ authentication, trade execution, both through its operating marketplace, as well as SaaS through a monthly fee (e.g. implementing similar marketplace technologies tailored to specific client needs).
Recognized as being in the forefront of innovation in the agri-trading industry, Cerealia performed the world's first wheat trade on blockchain (2018), and the first trade and contract-execution on blockchain (2019).
